slotMachine.title: Slot Machine
slotMachine.description: Classic reel animation with thrilling drawing experience

detailed.howItWorks: Simulates real slot machine reel effects, names scroll rapidly through acceleration, constant speed, and deceleration phases before stopping
detailed.bestFor: Perfect for entertaining lottery scenarios like annual meeting draws, game selection, prize draws, etc.
tips: Reels automatically go through acceleration and deceleration
Can display multiple reels for multi-person draws
Works best with sound effects
Great for creating exciting, suspenseful atmosphere
scenarios: Company annual meeting grand prize draws

cardFlip.title: Card Drawing
cardFlip.description: Elegant card flip animation like a magician's performance

detailed.howItWorks: First performs shuffle animation, then deals cards one by one to designated positions, participants click cards to flip and reveal results
detailed.bestFor: Perfect for scenarios requiring mystery and ceremony, such as mystery gifts, special rewards, etc.
tips: Each card can be flipped individually
Supports custom card back designs
Flip order is freely chosen by participants
Suitable for small to medium-sized draws

bulletScreen.title: Bullet Screen Scrolling
bulletScreen.description: Fast scrolling freeze, dynamic selection process
bulletScreen.altDescription: Dynamic bullet screen effects, modern drawing method

detailed.howItWorks: Names scroll as bullet screen rapidly, going through acceleration, constant speed, and deceleration phases before highlighting the final selected result
detailed.bestFor: Perfect for modern, tech-savvy scenarios, especially popular with younger audiences
tips: Bullet screen speed automatically adjusts
Supports colorful bullet effects
Final result gets special highlighting
Great for large screens and projector displays

bulletScreen.bulletScreenOnly: This page only supports bullet screen mode
bulletScreen.scrollingInProgress: Bullet screen scrolling in progress, please wait...

gridLottery.title: Multi-Grid Lottery
gridLottery.description: TV show style, light jumping freeze, full of ceremony
gridLottery.altDescription: Classic grid jumping, single draw for one lucky winner

detailed.howItWorks: Arranges participants in a grid, light jumps rapidly between cells, finally stopping on the selected cell
detailed.bestFor: Perfect for formal occasions requiring single person selection, such as grand prize draws, important role selection, etc.
tips: Can only draw one result at a time
Grid layout automatically adjusts based on participant count
Jump speed gradually slows to build suspense
Ideal for important prize draws

blinkingNamePicker.title: Blinking Name Calling
blinkingNamePicker.description: Fast blinking freeze, fair random name calling experience
blinkingNamePicker.altDescription: Fast blinking highlight, suitable for classroom name calling
features: Suitable for teaching and team scenarios

detailed.howItWorks: Blinking name picker rapidly highlights names, then gradually slows down until stopping on a randomly selected name
detailed.bestFor: Best suited for classroom teaching, team meetings, random name calling and other scenarios requiring fair selection
tips: Use spacebar to control start and stop
Supports multiple consecutive rounds
Blinking speed automatically adjusts to build suspense
Works best on large screens for better effect
scenarios: Random classroom name calling for questions
